description: Shopee Open Platform is a go-to source of Open APIs and services created to support developers serving Shopee sellers with different ecommerce needs

key_capabilities.name: Powerful APIs
key_capabilities.description: Access to Open APIs for orders, products, marketing and push notification services

key_capabilities.name: Developer Services
key_capabilities.description: End-to-end developer support including onboarding, APP development, testing, release, and maintenance

key_capabilities.name: Management Tools
features: Access to documentation, support center and announcements

user_types.description: Comprehensive range of Open APIs for software businesses covering Shopee's key ecommerce processes
For sellers who want to develop software tailored to their business needs and integrate systems with Shopee

notes: This appears to be an introduction/overview page of Shopee Open Platform documentation rather than a specific API endpoint documentation. It contains general information about the platform, its benefits, and who can access it.
